table_caption: Functional connectivity (FC) for the group contrasts (control > patient; patient > control) and their interaction with galvanic vestibular stimulation (post > pre‐GVS, pre > post‐GVS) is shown, using p < .05 FWE and p < .05 FDR corrected for multiple comparisons): FC[Control(post > pre‐GVS)] > FC[Patient(post > pre‐GVS)]
